description: In this course you will learn the amazing realm of energy and the science of how Reiki is possible.. First I will take you through the history of Reiki and its origins following with the architecture and substance of Reiki. We will discuss topics such as energy fields, fractals, sacred geometry and cymatics as well as the human electromagnetic field to better understand how Reiki relates to you and the world we live in. At the end of this course you will be able to apply Reiki to your everyday lifestyle and use it for personal transformation and live a life filled with love and joy. Estimated completion time of course: approx. 1.5 hours
title: The Science of Reiki
